name: Emergent Growth
originalText: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

rulings.text: If the target creature attacks, the defending player must assign at least one blocker to it during the declare blockers step if that player controls any creatures that could block it. Other creatures may also block it, block other creatures, or not block at all.

text: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
